attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was looking for some kind of redeemable qualities within our President, unfortunately my search yielded nothing in return expect for an inept ability to lead the country. The app completely fried my phone and made it crash three separate times, I think my phone could tell the vibes were RANCID. Anyways would never recommend this app to anyone, wouldn’t even recommend it to a snail if I could. Xoxo Gossip Girl.
attributes.title: Cinnamon Hitler Strikes Again...

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see MY presidents 🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️✨✨further updates on ice detention camps a.k.a. locking children in cages, that animals shouldn’t even be in, and his father anti-Black Lives Matter updates. This app made my phone glitch so bad I had to buy another one. The screen turn black and also the words “tRuMP 2o20”🍊 was flashing on my screen it’s literally the scariest experience. I recommend downloading this on your own risk. It’s such a terrible app and I wish that on no one.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: The worst app I have ever downloaded, once I downloaded the app I heard dog barking coming from my phone and it wouldn’t let me turn down the sound and it was really high pitched and super loud and my ears are now bleeding, I had to delete the app for the barking to stop but I couldn’t write a review so I downloaded it again so I could write the review and then THERE WAS ELEPHANT SOUNDS coming from my phone, I have no idea what is going on with this app, but IT IS SO BAD.
attributes.title: Barking and Almost as bad as the president himself

attributes.review:
The layout is so confusing I am a stereotypical republican, old.  Being old, I can’t understand all the tabs the buttons, or pts(I do not know what that means).  Also, ever since I got this app and wrote in my personal information, I have been getting many unneeded calls and emails.  
On a second note, I do not like how every time I want to sign up for a rally, this app takes me to safari.  Very annoying, needs to be fixed.
attributes.title: Confusing layout

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our WONDERFUL, CHRISTIAN president that brings NO harm to others in any shape or form but then it’s brought to my attention that this big round orange’s app was very glitchy and poor made. not only is this large orange a BAD person he also has a poor made app too so, i don’t know why people think it’s okay the vote this large round orange for president while you should be searching up all of the incredibly bad things this “hero” of yours has done. DON’T SUPPORT LARGE ROUND ORANGE MAN
attributes.title: big orange man

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in an attempt to see if I should vote for trump this coming election. All I got from the app is FAKE NEWS!! I also remembered that YOUR president Donald, is a racist, sexist, and homophobic person. He counties to make racist remarks, he retweeted a video of a white man screaming “white power”. He continues to try and reverse protections for lgbtq+ people, he banned transgender individuals from joining the military! He continues to make sexist remarks, he’s sexually assaulted many women! He needs to be locked in jail for his actions.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS FAKE NEWS!!!

attributes.review: So i downloaded this app to keep up with the news about my beloved president 💖 and it took so long to download maybe 1 hour , i got into the app exited to see all the ✨𝑗𝑢𝑖𝑐𝑦 𝑛𝑒𝑤𝑠✨and to my surprise their was a really weird orange cheeto it surprised me soooo much then the orange cheeto face started glitching , going from black to white and red , I was so startled I dropped my phone off the stairs which then fell 3 flights spiraling to its doom...... i had to get a new phone sadly😔
attributes.title: It made me crack my phone screen 😡

attributes.review: Downloaded this app thinking it would really solidify my admiration for Sir Trump, but as soon as I downloaded it and registered for my local trump rally (that I don’t think I’ll be able to attend, I actually have covid 😔) the app crashed all my other apps. Everything I had got DELETED. Even my pictures and posts in support of Trump. The SICK TWISTED LEFT is behind this I already know!DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app! It has been taken over by the snowflake lefts.
attributes.title: Why does this app suppress me love for the Trumpster??

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to help show support to our lovely president 🙂, but was forced into giving them my number to be added onto a call list and it wouldn’t let me continue until I did (weird), so I gave them my sisters just to make sure it was safe. After that it asked for my location which I thought was also very strange and out of no where my sister screamed to the top of her lungs “A TINY ORANGE P***S WAS JUST SENT TO ME BY AN UNKNOWN NUMBER” and to the day she has nightmares 😖🤢
attributes.title: MAKES ME WANT TO COMIT

attributes.review: I, a middle aged women who wanted to do something to support trump besides plastering MAGA every where and yelling at minorities. So i decided to download this app, deciding that it would be a good way to stay updated on what our wonderful cheeto president was doing for everyone. But alas when I went into the app the loading screen was his face! Of the horror I had to deal with! It scared me half to death! It made me so scared I was even scared to go to McDonalds! I didn’t know if I could trust them.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrid
